items.title: Secure
items.text: Uses industry standard encryption techniques. Hosted in Europe. Subject to strict UK data protection laws.

items.title: Simple
items.text: Configuring your GPS tracker can be challenging, we provide simple instructions in plain English. Support available.

items.title: Universal
items.text: Track people and things with inexpensive GPS tracking devices or mobile phones. Support for handheld and vehicle trackers.

items.title: Trusted
items.text: ten20 (Birkett Enterprise Ltd) has 6 years experience running GPS tracking service with 400,000 registered users.
